title: Not able to open game launcher

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
https://gyazo.com/97e3d2726c0c7b64728a96c60686d128

This has been happening to me for the past 2 days, but this isnt the first time it has happened. Usually when this happens I can restart my pc and it will work, but now that doesnt work and everytime I try I get the same problem.

Got any ways I could fix this? I've tried reinstalling

help pls

replies.body: Usually this is a result of a permissions issue where the patcher isn't receiving the proper authorization to connect to the patching server.  I'd check out our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) article for info on how to set up your permissions.  Let me know if it works for you!
I have the same thing... So yeah. Please ?
